title: China reports third-quarter GDP growth of 4.6%, slightly beating expectations
content: Beijing has faced public scrutiny over its ability to meet its own annual growth target of "around 5%."
summary: Beijing has faced public scrutiny over its ability to meet its own annual growth target of "around 5%."

title: IMF chief warns 'not yet time to celebrate' as low growth and high debt weigh on global economy
content: The head of the International Monetary Fund cautioned on Thursday that high government debt and low growth remained major impediments to the global economy.
summary: The head of the International Monetary Fund cautioned on Thursday that high government debt and low growth remained major impediments to the global economy.

title: Intel seeks billions for minority stake in Altera business, sources say
content: This move that would represent a sharp about face from its earlier public messaging about the larger company's prospects.
summary: This move that would represent a sharp about face from its earlier public messaging about the larger company's prospects.

title: Netflix third-quarter subscribers barely beat estimates as ad-tier members jump 35%
content: Netflix's ad-tier memberships jumped 35%. The company is on track to launch the service in Canada in the coming quarter and more broadly in 2025.
summary: Netflix's ad-tier memberships jumped 35%. The company is on track to launch the service in Canada in the coming quarter and more broadly in 2025.

title: Google CEO names new search and ads boss, slides predecessor to role of chief technologist
content: Google is replacing Prabhakar Raghavan, the company's search and ads boss since 2018, with longtime executive Nick Fox.
summary: Google is replacing Prabhakar Raghavan, the company's search and ads boss since 2018, with longtime executive Nick Fox.

title: CNBC's Inside India newsletter: The changing face of India's rich
content: The Tatas, Ambanis and Adanis have long been the face of India's wealthy population. That is changing as India's rich populace gets a new identity.
summary: The Tatas, Ambanis and Adanis have long been the face of India's wealthy population. That is changing as India's rich populace gets a new identity.

title: Historic bitcoin theft tied to Connecticut kidnapping, luxury cars, $500K bar bills
content: The kidnapping of a Connecticut couple has been linked to one of the biggest thefts of cryptocurrency from an individual in United States history.
summary: The kidnapping of a Connecticut couple has been linked to one of the biggest thefts of cryptocurrency from an individual in United States history.

title: Overseas UK territories are the ‘biggest enablers of corporate tax abuse,’ tax advocacy group says
content: British overseas territories are the world's top enablers of corporate tax abuse, according to a ranking by tax advocacy group Tax Justice Network.
summary: British overseas territories are the world's top enablers of corporate tax abuse, according to a ranking by tax advocacy group Tax Justice Network.

title: China pledges more financial support for 'whitelist' real estate projects
content: Ni Hong, China's minister of housing and urban-rural development, made the announcement at a press conference on Thursday.

title: CNBC Daily Open: The Dow hits another high amid a mostly flat market
content: U.S. economic data came in strong and earnings reports continue to beat expectations. That helped to push the Dow to another record close.
summary: U.S. economic data came in strong and earnings reports continue to beat expectations. That helped to push the Dow to another record close.

title: Hamas leader Yahya Sinwar has been killed, Israeli foreign minister says
content: Sinwar assumed overall command of the Iran-backed Hamas in August, following the assassination of former political chief Ismail Haniyeh.
summary: Sinwar assumed overall command of the Iran-backed Hamas in August, following the assassination of former political chief Ismail Haniyeh.

title: FBI arrests Alabama man for SEC X hack that spiked price of bitcoin
content: Eric Council Jr. is accused of conspiracy in the hack of the Securities and Exchange Commission X account that tweeted a false claim about bitcoin.
summary: Eric Council Jr. is accused of conspiracy in the hack of the Securities and Exchange Commission X account that tweeted a false claim about bitcoin.

title: Amazon makes first foray into live news with election night special hosted by Brian Williams
content: The company plans to host a one-night special with live election results and analysis on its Prime Video streaming service.

title: The solid-state batteries hype is fading – prompting auto giants to consider alternatives
content: Despite the hype around solid-state batteries, some analysts believe an alternative could serve as a bridge between these are traditional lithium-ion batteries.

title: Auto giants launch a flurry of cheaper electric vehicles — taking the fight to China
content: Europe's top carmakers unveiled low-cost EVs at the Paris Motor Show this week, seeking to recapture some of the market share held by Chinese brands.
summary: Europe's top carmakers unveiled low-cost EVs at the Paris Motor Show this week, seeking to recapture some of the market share held by Chinese brands.

title: Nvidia and Apple supplier TSMC shares pop 10% after quarterly profit soars on AI demand

title: Retail sales rose 0.4% in September, better than expected; jobless claims dip
content: Consumer spending held up in September, underscoring a resilient economy.

title: UK regulator warns of big fines, service suspensions for tech giants ahead of new safety rules
content: Technology giants could face "significant" fines if they don't comply with the U.K.'s internet safety regulations, the British media regulator Ofcom warned Thursday.
summary: Technology giants could face "significant" fines if they don't comply with the U.K.'s internet safety regulations, the British media regulator Ofcom warned Thursday.

title: UK's ultra-rich non-doms urge Italian-style tax regime to prevent wealth exodus
content: Britain's ultra-rich non-doms are urging the government to introduce an Italian-style flat-tax regime to prevent a wealth exodus as their preferential status comes under threat in the budget.

title: Intel faces headwinds in China as trade body calls for security probe

title: ASML just gave us a first glimpse into how U.S. chip export curbs will dent its China sales

title: I bought a $54,000 abandoned house in Japan and turned it into a luxury Airbnb—take a look inside

title: Amazon goes nuclear, to invest more than $500 million to develop small modular reactors

title: Global chip stocks fall on ASML's disappointing outlook, possible U.S. export cap
content: Global semiconductor stocks dropped, after ASML's third-quarter results pointed to a weaker 2025 sales outlook than the Dutch firm guided  previously.

title: Stanley Druckenmiller says he's 'licking my wounds' from selling Nvidia too soon

title: Generative AI startups get 40% of all VC investment in cloud amid ChatGPT buzz
